summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2522, for the improvement of 42nd Avenue South from Alaska Street to Court Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 29034 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
